segments.text: This is Kelly speaking . I am calling from London . How are you , Mr . Chang ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , Kelly , I couldn't recognize your voice . Well , I'm fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mr . Chang , I just want to tell you that we are leaving London for Beijing by flight CP 645 on Saturday morning . Could you meet us at the airport , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excuse me , I couldn't quite hear you . This line is crossed . Can you speak louder , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will say it again ... Do you hear me now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Much better . I will definitely go to the airport to meet you .
segments.speaker: S2
